info.+content: Pocket Monsters Diamond & Pearl: Dialga vs. Palkia vs. Darkrai
ポケットモンスター ダイヤモンド＆パール ディアルガVSパルキアVSダークライ
神奇寶貝 決戰時空の塔 帝牙盧卡 VS 帕路奇犽 達克萊伊

Dialga rules time, and Palkia rules space, they lived in an alternate dimension so they decided to fight within their own reality, which would make it bad for the real world too. Dialga and Palkia appear before Ash and his friends and drag the city into their own world. If they destroy this city, they'll also destroy the whole world.
"We Will be Heroes - The Rise of Darkrai" by John Loeffler
"I Will be with You ~Itsumo Soba ni~ (Movie Version)" by Sarah Brightman with Chris Thompson
"I'll Always Remember You" by Kirsten Price
"Living in the Shadow" by Chris "Breeze" Barczynski
神奇寶貝專區《決戰時空の塔》
